item.description:
Time for another Happy Hour! We will try Thursday this time. Time is set for 5 pm ...but come whenever you can join us. The price was right the last time for specials ...so lets try this place again. Next time we will be trying someplace new. If you have a favorite place...we'd love to try it. So let me know for a future Happy Hour.

Lots of great ideas and good conversation at the last event. BTW...if you have photos of any past trips...bring them to share with us!!! Looking forward to seeng you all again and , of course, new faces as well!!!

Spread the word to your friends...we are Have Fun,Will Travel!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the sign on our FUN table! We will be on the patio..weather permitting.
item.name: Happy Hour for Happy Travelers!!!!
